name: MTLIntersectionFunctionTable
desc: A table of intersection functions that Metal calls to perform ray-tracing intersection tests.

items.name: func setFunction(MTLFunctionHandle?, index: Int)
items.desc: Sets an entry in the table.

items.name: func setFunctions([MTLFunctionHandle?], range: Range<Int>)
items.desc: Sets a range of entries in the table.

items.name: func setBuffer(MTLBuffer?, offset: Int, index: Int)
items.desc: Sets a buffer for the intersection functions.

items.name: func setBuffers([MTLBuffer?], offsets: [Int], range: Range<Int>)
items.desc: Sets a range of buffers for the intersection functions.

items.name: func setVisibleFunctionTable(MTLVisibleFunctionTable?, bufferIndex: Int)
items.desc: Sets a visible function table for the intersection functions.

items.name: func setVisibleFunctionTables([MTLVisibleFunctionTable?], bufferRange: Range<Int>)
items.desc: Sets a range of visible function tables for the intersection functions.

items.name: func setOpaqueTriangleIntersectionFunction(signature: MTLIntersectionFunctionSignature, index: Int)
items.desc: Sets an entry in the intersection table to point to a system-defined opaque triangle intersection function.

items.name: func setOpaqueTriangleIntersectionFunction(signature: MTLIntersectionFunctionSignature, range: NSRange)
items.desc: Sets a range of entries in the intersection table to point to a system-defined opaque triangle intersection function.
